thread.title: Passengers at Kuwait International Airport increases by one percentTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Passengers at Kuwait International Airport increases by one percentTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Passengers at Kuwait International Airport increases by one percent
The number of passengers at the Kuwait International Airport increased by one percent last June, reaching 946,069, compared to 934,872 in the same month of 2014, the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) said, on Wednesday.
The number of passengers coming to Kuwait reached 447,718 last June, compared to 438,244 in the same month of 2014, the directorate added in a press statement.
The Number of passengers departing Kuwait last June hit 498,351 compared to 496,628 in the same month in 2014, it noted.
The total commercial flights last June was estimated at 7,757 compared to 7,049 in the same month last year, it said.
The air freight reached 16.5 million kgs in June compared to 16.6 million kgs in the same month a year ago.
